resources.string: Picross is a logic game of filling squares in a grid.
The numbers above the grid are how many cells in each column must be filled. The numbers beside the grid are how many cells in each row must be filled.
The top row needs to have 5 cells filled. Since it only has 5 cells, all must be filled. You can fill a cell by tapping it.
Now the left column already has 1 cell filled, so it is done. You can mark cells as empty by double tapping them.
The rightmost column clue, "2 2", means there is a block of 2 cells connected with some space in between another block of 2 cells. There is only one possible solution.
